headline.main: 2 ENEMY SHIPS HIT; Cruiser, Damaged, Flees -- German Destroyer Left Sinking OPERATIONS ARE STILL ON Wireless Silence Enshrouds the Fighting -- No U.S. Ships in Engagement

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 31 -- British ships have made contact with the Germans in northern waters and damaged one German cruiser, which withdrew, and severely hit one destroyer, which was last seen in a sinking condition, the Admiralty announced tonight.
abstract: Brit ships damage Ger cruiser and destroyer, northern waters
snippet: LONDON, Dec. 31 -- British ships have made contact with the Germans in northern waters and damaged one German cruiser, which withdrew, and severely hit one destroyer, which was last seen in a sinking condition, the Admiralty announced tonight....

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
